Question: In a series circuit with a resistor of $R=24 \Omega$, an inductor of $L=2 \mathrm{H}$, a capacitor of $C=0.005 \mathrm{F}$, initially charged to $Q=0.001 \mathrm{C}$ with no starting current, the battery has been replaced by a generator that emits a voltage described by $E(t)=12 \sin 10 t$. Calculate the charge on the capacitor at time $t=0.2$ seconds after the generator begins operation. Provide the answer in Coulombs, rounded to five significant figures.
